description:
Taiga is a 6th grade tough guy who the neighborhood elementary students adore.  Bunji is completely into him too. After Bunji comes home from playing with Taiga, he speaks and acts like a tough guy. The spirit of relaxed education appears before Mom, who is shouting at Bunji again today. Truth is Bunji can do it and there is a trump card to further motivate him except... Every mom has their own secret attachment to their children. Mom loves the springy feeling of Fumi`s stomach and butt, and melts when touching her. Mom and Fumi argue over overcooking ingredients. Bunji jumps in and intervenes while dancing pantless.  His appearance really resembles Dad...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tough Guy / A Man Who Can Do It / Poke Poke / Genes
ちょいワル / できる男 / ぷりぷり / 遺伝
